pages.title: Quest System
pages.text: $(br)This modpack includes a built-in quest system. By completing quests, you can experience most of the game's content and earn rewards.$(br2)Hold the $(key)Quest Scroll$() and right-click to browse all currently active quests. Select one and right-click again to try submitting it. Submitting successfully unlocks more quests.

$(br)When you submit a quest, the system checks your current status. Common checks include:$(br)$(list)$(bold)Attributes$()$(list)$(bold)Advancement progress$()$(list)$(bold)Whether you have certain items$()$(br)(You must manually place the required items in your $(bold)inventory, equipment slots, or trinket slots$().)$(br2)Quest progress is $(bold)per-player$(). If you want to share progress with friends, you can share the required items with them.
$(br)If you accidentally lose the $(key)Quest Scroll$(), don't worry â€” you can craft a new one at a very low cost.
